Text: RE Dec Miso Mtg Details Agenda Cc Joe Gardner with MISO indicated that he can at a minimum participate by conference call for part of the meeting He is to get back with me to indicate whether he can attend in person Original Message From Ed Comer mailto Sent Monday December AM To Gollomp Jeff Cc Cynthia Trueheart Ed Comer Subject Dec Miso Mtg Details Agenda Our December meeting in Columbus will begin at at AEPs Headquarters Office in a Conference Room on the th floor The address is American Electric Power Riverside Plaza th Floor Conference Room C Columbus OH For Directions from the airport as you exit down International Gateway follow the signs to I Take I west to downtown exit onto Third Street Follow Third Street and turn right onto Spring Street Follow Spring Street to MarconiCivic Center Drive and turn left There is an Alcoa parking garage on the left side that Mitch recommends parking in The AEP building is directly across the street We expect about people including representatives form Cinergy and LGE Mitch drafted an agenda which is attached

RE Dec Miso Mtg Details Agenda Cc It appears now that Joe Gardner and Tom Mallinger will be attending Original Message From Gollomp Jeff Sent Monday December PM To Ed Comer Cc Cynthia Trueheart Subject RE Dec Miso Mtg Details Agenda Joe Gardner with MISO indicated that he can at a minimum participate by conference call for part of the meeting He is to get back with me to indicate whether he can attend in person Original Message From Ed Comer mailto Sent Monday December AM To Gollomp Jeff Cc Cynthia Trueheart Ed Comer Subject Dec Miso Mtg Details Agenda Our December meeting in Columbus will begin at at AEPs Headquarters Office in a Conference Room on the th floor The address is American Electric Power Riverside Plaza th Floor Conference Room C Columbus OH For Directions from the airport as you exit down International Gateway follow the signs to I Take I west to downtown exit onto Third Street Follow Third Street and turn right onto Spring Street Follow Spring Street to MarconiCivic Center Drive and turn left There is an Alcoa parking garage on the left side that Mitch recommends parking in The AEP building is directly across the street We expect about people including representatives form Cinergy and LGE Mitch drafted an agenda which is attached
